bibl.title: A Cancelled Marriage Contract from the Judaean Desert (XHev/Se Gr. 2).
bibl.note: I. [Introduction.] - II. [Text, Translation and Notes.] - III. Commentary. Place and Date: Aristoboulias, Zif, and Yaqim (or Yakum) in 130 C.E. - Marriage Practices. - IV. The Marriage Contract and the Rabbinic Ketubba. - Appendix I. The Jews of Arabia. - Appendix II. A Note on the Jewish Sources.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Nahal Hever Inv. XHev/Se Gr. 2 870
COTTON Hannah M., A Cancelled Marriage Contract from the Judaean Desert (XHev/Se Gr. 2).
